title: FREE POOL PARTY SKINS!

embed.description: The new Pool Party promotion is splashing! Skins await.

body:
I know it isn't official riot website, but I want to test it.
They say it is community thing.

I REALLY WANT TO TRY IT
Thanks in advance

replies.poster: M U C K F A R C
replies.body: When you reach 10 points its going to ask you if you're a bot, So yeah they give you a survey to fill out. {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
